TopicTitle: Ranting about "Kerbalnaughts" and the K syndrome.

Articles.Content:
Kerbol is the star of their world so it is not unreasonable for Kerbonauts to be what they call their astronauts.

No, it isn't. It's Sun.
I find your "K-syndrome" naming of this behavior very konfusing.
I say we make a thread called "K-Syndrome Isolation" where all the infected can join and dump all their Krap... wait, oh kno! The K's are koming! Krud! Oh Kod why me....
Over a 100 comments on the most trivial subject on this forum. You guys...

So if they find a mineral that makes the Kerbal astronauts weak will we have to call it Hryptonite?

Sure. Why not.

BTW, no one steal my idea to have aliens confused by humans and search for a planet named "Huma":

Though I haven't used it yer.

Astrolpapi1, your little rant has spawned quite an interesting thread. Nice going.

I find your "K-syndrome" naming of this behavior very konfusing.

I thought of this too! One of a few real koncepts that use a K!
Alright alright. The horse has been thoroughly beaten here. I'm Klosing this thread.
